document_data.name: Seven Snakes
document_data.mainbody: The '''Seven Snakes''' were a mercenary and bandit group based out of [[Daggerford]] who predominantly did "dirty works" for the [[Zhentarim]]. Their primary contact was [[Nelkin Danniker]].
document_data.History: In the late 1480s or early 1490s DR, [[Kella Darkhope]] hired them in order to occupy the village of [[Nightstone]].
